scripts.build:debug: mkdirp build && cd build && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug ../src/lib/bas2tap/ && make && cp-cli bas2tap.js ../public/dist/bas2tap.js
scripts.build:release: mkdirp build && cd build && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ../src/lib/bas2tap/ && make && cp-cli bas2tap.js ../public/dist/bas2tap.js
